synopsis.text:
There's a new kind of chaos in the Shiawase apartment complex, and it's all thanks to a mischievous little creature named Okojo-san. Originally from the mountains of the North, Okojo-san finds himself in a local pet store, but his adventurous spirit won't allow him to stay confined for long. After a daring escape, he ends up in the care of Haruka Tsuchiya, a down-to-earth university student who mistakes him for a ferret.

As Okojo-san tries to navigate the strange world of humans, he encounters a host of eccentric characters, both human and animal, including a mouse named Chorori. From dealing with vacuum cleaners to interacting with the apartment's quirky tenants, Okojo-san's life is filled with absurd and hilarious situations. With his sharp wit and a flair for the dramatic, he turns everyday occurrences into comedic gold.

This gag anime thrives on its absurdity, with Okojo-san's antics at the heart of it all. Prepare for a wild ride filled with laughter and oddities in this unique tale of a pet trying to adapt to his new life.
